extracted_information: Comprehensive game information for Age of Empires IV, including its title, detailed descriptions of campaigns and gameplay, various ratings and awards, and a collection of official media URLs. Developer, publisher, and the specific original release date for the PC version are not explicitly stated within the provided content, though it mentions availability on PC Game Pass and future release/pre-order for PlayStation 5, as well as an already available expansion. Awards from 2021 and 2022 suggest the game's release prior to these dates.

minimum.processor: Intel Core i5-6300U, or AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
minimum.graphics: Intel HD 520, or AMD Radeon RX Vega 11

recommended.gpu: Nvidia Geforce 970 GPU, or AMD Radeon RX 570 GPU

features.title: Age of Empires IV
features.description: Age of Empires IV takes players on a journey through the ages as they command influential leaders, build expansive kingdoms, and fight some of the most critical battles of the Middle Ages. Players explore the world, locate essential resources, construct buildings, produce units, and build economies, while fighting off enemy raids and attacks. The goal is to guide the empire through the ages and strike enemies to claim victory.

features.title: Norman Campaign
features.description: Players start with William of Normandy on his journey to conquer England, experiencing an epic story of succession, family conflict, anarchy, and rebellion.

features.title: Hundred Years War
features.description: Players defend France against English raiding, evolving through chivalric knighthood, the determination of Jeanne d’Arc, and cannon fire. The campaign focuses on defending France, turning the tide of war, and forging the French nation.

features.title: The Rise of Moscow
features.description: This campaign chronicles Moscow's growth from a humble outpost to a new superpower. Playing as the Rus, players battle the Mongol invasion, unite allies and foes, and shift from subjugation to independence.

features.title: The Mongol Empire
features.description: Players experience the thunderous rise of the Mongol Empire under Genghis Khan, focusing on tactics, martial skills, and adaptation that led to the largest contiguous land empire.

temporal_info.original_pc_release_date: Not found in provided content (inferred to be prior to 2021 based on awards)

title: Age of Empires IV
